name: Transcorp Hilton Abuja

description: Well-known hotel near the airport with modern rooms, multiple restaurants, and a pool.

description: Historic hotel offering casino, pools, and upscale rooms in the heart of Lagos.

description: Modern hotel with spacious rooms, spa, fitness center, and several dining options.
